entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 03:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets overnight. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
